name: Battle Master
overview: Battle Master is a 3D Fighter game that was released by in 1998. The game features different characters but only one is playable at the beginning of the game. The game takes places in a near future and is somehow of tournament of fighters from different places of the world. The main character of the game (and the only one avaliable at the beginning) is Ellney, a young girl fighter. To play with other characters the player have to advance in the main mode and defeat them. Enjoy two types of robot combat battle 3D action fighting and fighting character. Technology is transferred to the robot learned to fight each other characters.
